description.p: AppsEdu is a software center capable of manage zomandos and install software approved and reviewed published at AppsEdu (https://portal.edu.gva.es/appsedu).
AppsEdu es un centre de aplicacions per al programari publicat a AppsEdu (https://portal.edu.gva.es/appsedu).
AppsEdu es un centro de aplicaciones para el software publicado en AppsEdu (https://portal.edu.gva.es/appsedu).
